summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Pike Place Market Preservation and Development Authority; authorizing the City to guarantee the issuance of not to exceed $8.4 million ($8,400.000.00) in tax-exempt bonds; authorizing the issuance of said bonds; providing for the sale of certain real property to the Authority; authorizing an agreement for the development, construction and management of a public parking facility; and certain other matters in connection therewith.
